name: My Monkeys Are Out Of Control
name_original: My Monkeys Are Out Of Control
description:
Submission for GMTK2020 - Out Of Control - Game Jam

The monkeys are loose and they've grabbed all the go karts. Use your experimental portal gun to capture as many monkeys as you can. But be careful! The portal gun has been known to malfunction and injure its user.

Good luck!
